lead_paragraph: One Day University offers people who got their bachelor’s degree years before e-mail a chance to go to university classes again, but without all that drinking and flirting.
snippet: One Day University offers people who got their bachelor’s degree years before e-mail a chance to go to university classes again, but without all that drinking and flirting.

headline.main: Returning to College, Without the Beer
headline.print_headline: Returning To College, Without The Beer
headline.seo: The Value of College, the Abridged Version
headline.sub: Lifelong learning? At One Day University, a rapid-fire pace leaves one student ready to take a break. ;
